body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       We want you to have a safe and enjoyable visit to Pu'ukohola Heiau National Historic Site. Help ensure a safe and pleasant park experience by remembering the following:  It is almost always sunny and hot in the park, so bring plenty of water, a hat and sunscreen Prevent fires by properly extinguishing cigarettes (smoking is not allowed along park trails) Watch your step and stay on trails Report any accident or violation of regulations to a park ranger In case of an emergency, call 911
